item.title: SPLITTERZELLE + FrontPageLeslie + Dark Baustelle + Prüfkörper
item.description: ITR & H.C. present: Fr 14. Feb @ Hitness Club SPLITTERZELLE (brln/portugal) 🚀☄️ Sidney Jaffe (Arcane Allies, Burnpilot, Parse) on drums&synths + Pedro Pestana (10 000 Russos, Tren Go! Sound System) on guitar+pedals will take us on an intergalactic sonic journey vid1 / vid2 / LT / IG FrontPageLeslie (bxl) 🧾☢ -> record release party, tape out on U-Bac further links: FPL bc / youtube / insta Dark Baustelle (weimar) 🏗🚛
